article_title: The world's oceans could recover from human threat by 2050, says new study
article_description: Marine life ravaged by years of fishing activity  nuclear tests and chemical pollution could see a  substantial recovery  by 2050 if world governments invest billions a year in restoration  according to a study released Wednesday
